item.title: Can anybody give me the ::female and ::male commands plz?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:6, topic:269502”][quote author=`Jayden. link=topic=355669.msg2722106#msg2722106 date=1238044586]
I was only trying to help.
[/quote]

I realize that, but helping while teaching will excel them much further than sitting there doing it for them.

If someone is going into a culinary career then teaching them to cook will benefit them more then cooking for them.[/quote]
I agree with not spoon feeding, but for this one, how would Rasmux have known that pTorso would be 57 for a female? I don’t think there are even lists of these on Google.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anybody give me the ::female and ::male commands plz?
item.dc:creator: @_Jayden1 `Jayden.
item.description:
@_Jayden1 wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:4, topic:269502”][quote author=`Jayden. link=topic=355669.msg2722030#msg2722030 date=1238036661]

if (command.startsWith("male")) { sendMessage("You're now a man..."); pHead = 1; pBeard = 10; pTorso = pBeard; pArms = 26; pHands = 33; pLegs = 36; pFeet = =42; updateRequired = true appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.StartsWith(female")) { sendMessage("You're now a girl..."); pHead = pFeet; pTorso = 57; pArms = 62; pHands = 68; pLegs = 72; pFeet = 80; updateRequired = true; AppearanceUpdateRequired = true } }

=)
[/quote]

Use the search bar; we aren’t a spoon-feeding community.

`Jayden have you not read any of the stuck topics?[/quote]

I was only trying to help.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anybody give me the ::female and ::male commands plz?
item.dc:creator: @_Jayden1 `Jayden.
item.description:
@_Jayden1 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("male")) { sendMessage("You're now a man..."); pHead = 1; pBeard = 10; pTorso = 18; pArms = 26; pHands = 33; pLegs = 36; pFeet = 42; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (command.startsWith("female")) { sendMessage("You're now a girl..."); pHead = 50; pTorso = 57; pArms = 62; pHands = 68; pLegs = 72; pFeet = 80; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

=)

Read full topic
